underlying_goal: To debug and identify the root cause of Claude Code hanging indefinitely on startup.
friction_detail: Claude's initial hypotheses about history file size and a buggy hook were incorrect, requiring the user to state the problem persisted before a deeper investigation found the true root cause.
primary_success: Systematically debugged a complex startup hang, correctly identifying the non-obvious root cause: an infinite retry loop caused by orphaned plugins and a broken relative marketplace path.
brief_summary: The user reported Claude Code was hanging on startup. Claude systematically investigated, first incorrectly identifying history bloat and a buggy hook as the cause. After those fixes failed, a deeper investigation correctly pinpointed the root cause as an infinite retry loop involving orphaned plugins, and a robust fix was planned.
